rules_text: Each player sacrifices a creature. If you sacrificed a creature this way, you may return another creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Make a statement. [i](Put a lore counter on a Saga you control or surveil 1.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Georgie covered her ears, but it did not block out the dead women's whispers: “The moment that you die will feel exactly the same as this one.”[/i]
